title: Super envy-freeness
summary: A super-envy-free division is a kind of a fair division. It is a division of resources among n partners, in which each partner values his/her share at strictly more than his/her due share of 1/n of the total value, and simultaneously, values the share of every other partner at strictly less than 1/n.  Formally, in a super-envy-free division of a resource C among n partners, each partner i, with value measure Vi, receives a share Xi such that:
